author: Daniel Bovey
description: Coconut water adds dilution and subtly flavours this cognac-based cocktail with sweet vermouth and subtle notes of chocolate and Angostura.
name: Trade Winds
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth
5 ml Dark cr√®me de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
